effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

short_effect.x_y: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Lowers the target’s Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by one stage if it is poisoned.

flavor_text.x_y: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Opposing Pokémon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.
